name: Pacsafe Travelsafe 12L GII Portable Safe
description: Hotel safes are fine, but the fee for using them can make you feel like you're being robbed. This slash-resistant sleeve protects your laptop and locks to fixtures around hotel rooms, cafes, pools or planes, and folds up to pack away when not in use.Outer is made of rugged polyester canvas with a water-resistant coating.Lining is soft brushed polyester, light coloured for good visibility of contents.EVA foam padding protects your electronics.eXomesh® slashguard wire mesh woven between fabric layers.eXomesh system locks safe closed and to fixtures.TSA-compliant.Fits up to a 15in. laptop.Dimensions are 52 x 35 x 1.3cm.Volume is 12L.
